state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, make an effort to take a trip west. And then, go south. If you can get through with that, make an effort to venture east. After that, go to the north. And then, try to go to the north. That done, make an effort to move west. Then, travel south. After that, take a trip south. If you can succeed at that, travel west. And then, head south. Once you get around to doing that, make an effort to travel west. And then, try to go to the north. After that, head east. With that over with, attempt to move north. Next, pick up the coin from the floor of the workshop. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Recreation Zone =- You've entered a recreation zone. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Recreation Zone =-0/1
